ComicInfo.Summary: Fugitive Part 2 of 3: Sara rescues Patrick from the giant man-monster who is killing him. As the creature runs off, Patrick refuses to let Sara heal him with the Witchblade. The pair track down Michael Andrews to Ellis Island where he reveals his origins as a U.S. super soldier who is running and hiding from the folks who created him. Carstens and McGuinn, the FBI agents on the case, show up and manifest powers as they demand that Michael give himself up and that Sara give them the Witchblade.
ComicInfo.Tags: GUESTS: Patrick Gleason,Heather McGuinn,VILLAINS: Jon Carstens,Michael Andrews (origin),Witchblade [Sara Pezzini]
